summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Board of Adjustment (Panel B) of the City of Dallas will convene on February 21, 2024, for a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to address various zoning and adjustment requests from residents and stakeholders.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes a staff presentation, a public hearing for testimony, and the approval of previous meeting minutes. Additionally, the Board will review several case dockets, including uncontested items and holdover cases.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals under consideration include three holdover cases:  
1. **BDA234-004(DB)** at 1930 Hi Line Drive, requesting a special exception to parking regulations.  
2. **BDA234-010(KMH)** at 4811 Kelsey Road, seeking a special exception to fence height regulations.  
3. **BDA234-018(DB)** at 7217 Brookshire Drive, appealing the denial of a building permit by the development services department.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is expected to make decisions on the holdover cases and approve the minutes from the January 17, 2024 meeting. Public testimony will also be taken into account before final decisions are made. Individuals wishing to speak must register by February 20, 2024.
